site-title: Bohrom - Transportation in the Liberec Region and Czech Republic

hiro.p: Safe transportation of furniture and cargo throughout the Czech Republic
hiro.wellCallYou: And our specialist will contact you and answer all your questions.

about.p1: — is a team of professionals who will help you carry out any move quickly, safely, and at an affordable price.
about.p2: We operate in the Liberec region and throughout the Czech Republic. Our fleet is equipped with modern vehicles that allow us to efficiently transport various types of cargo, ensuring their safety during transportation.
about.p3: We specialize in residential and office relocations and cargo transportation, using modern equipment and reliable transport.
about.p4: We have modern technologies and guarantee safe transportation with insurance.
about.p5: We are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to meet your needs at any convenient time.

tariffs.title: Tariffs
tariffs.p: We are available 24/7 to meet your needs at any convenient time.

ourServices.paragraph_1: Professional relocation of your home or office with attention to detail and safety.
ourServices.paragraph_2: Disassembly and packing of furniture for convenient transportation and subsequent assembly.
ourServices.paragraph_3: Efficient transportation of various types of cargo, including heavy and oversized items.
ourServices.heading_4: Disposal of Unwanted Furniture and Construction Waste
ourServices.paragraph_4: Organizing the disposal of old furniture and the recycling of construction waste to maintain cleanliness at your site.
ourServices.heading_5: Delivery of Furniture and Goods from Stores
ourServices.paragraph_5: Fast and reliable delivery of new furniture and goods from stores to your destination.
ourServices.paragraph_6: Transportation of building materials for your repairs or construction.

reason1.title: Residential and Office Relocations
reason1.description: Professional relocation of your home or office with attention to detail and safety.

reason3.title: Excellent Customer Service
reason3.description: Our team is always ready to assist you at any time, resolving any questions or issues.
